short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Create Research Projects using OpenAI ChatGPT technology. Automate global searches, take notes, generate documents, and collaborate.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Create Research Projects using OpenAI ChatGPT LLM technology. Automate global searches, take notes, generate documents, and collaborate with others. TAVA Discovery is the research platform that cuts through the clutter of modern ad- and SEO-driven search results, simultaneously crawling multiple search platforms to deliver the complete universe of sources you may be looking for. Easily curate, annotate, and collaborate on your Discoveries in real time.
